name: RoboReview
description: Made in 8 days for the GoedWareJam #5 with the themes "Love, Death, & Robots" and "The Price of Freedom". In RoboReview, you play as an unnamed RoboCorp employee who has to decide whether "robots" become "love" bots or "death" bots in order to make enough money to pay off your debts ("The Price of Freedom").
